results.title: Carboxymethyl beta-cyclodextrin as chiral selector in capillary electrophoresis: Enantioseparation of 16 basic chiral drugs and its chiral recognition mechanism associated with drugs' structural features.
results.text_hl: Herein we present the enantioseparation of 10 cardiovascular agents and six @<m>DISEASE_Bronchiectasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001987 @@@bronchiectasis drugs@@@ including @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Carteolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002354 @@@carteolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@metoprolol@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Pindolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010869 @@@pindolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_esmolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:C036604 @@@esmolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Bisoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017298 @@@bisoprolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_bevantolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:C021148 @@@bevantolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_arotinolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:C024523 @@@arotinolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Sotalol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013015 @@@sotalol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Clenbuterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002976 @@@clenbuterol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Procaterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017265 @@@procaterol@@@, @CHEMICAL_bambuterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:C047766 @@@bambuterol@@@, tranterol, @CHEMICAL_Albuterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000420 @@@salbutamol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Terbutaline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013726 @@@terbutaline sulfate@@@ using @CHEMICAL_carboxymethyl_beta_cyclodextrin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C441457 @@@carboxymethyl-beta-cyclodextrin@@@ (@CHEMICAL_carboxymethyl_beta_cyclodextrin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C441457 @@@CM-beta-CD@@@) as chiral selector.

citations.NLM: Fang L, Du Y, Hu X, Luo L, Guo X, Guo X, Yu J. Carboxymethyl beta-cyclodextrin as chiral selector in capillary electrophoresis: Enantioseparation of 16 basic chiral drugs and its chiral recognition mechanism associated with drugs' structural features. Biomed Chromatogr. 2017 Nov;31(11):. PMID: 28431453
